name: Mittens Boss Fight
description:
This is a small preview to our future game, Super Patrício Patrol Force. In this game, you play as Mittens, one of our main character.

Mittens is a really lucky kitten who also has a sniper. She's cool. You fight against a mean Dragon.

  • This game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised.
  • Programmer Art.
  • The screen shakes. A lot. Like, A LOT when the Boss health's low.
  • WASD to Move
  • Left Click to Shoot
  • Right Click to Change Weapon
  • Shift to Dash
  • R to Reload
  • F5 to Restart
  • Mika, "Moral support and circles." Art.
  • Alef, "Cool effects and money for sprites." Programmer/Art.
  • Gui, "Made stuff work." Programmer.
  • Raj, "Moral support." Art.
